Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Industry, Science and Technology and the Secretary of State of Canada, pursuant to subsection 3(1.41)* of the Copyright Act, is pleased hereby to make the annexed Regulations defining programming undertaking, effective August 31, 1993.

Section.Text: These Regulations may be cited as the Programming Undertaking Regulations.
For the purpose of subsection 3(1.4) of the Copyright Act, programming undertaking means a network, other than a network within the meaning of the Broadcasting Act, consisting of

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: a person who transmits by telecommunication all or part of the person’s programs or programming directly or indirectly to the person referred to in paragraph (b); and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a person who communicates all or part of the programs or programming referred to in paragraph (a) to the public by telecommunication.
